thread.section_title: 42nd Street Photo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 42nd Street Photo | www.42photo.com
thread.title: Ed Boek
thread.title_full: 42nd Street Photo reviewed by Ed Boek

author: Ed Boek
title: Ed Boek
text: I purchased a Sony Lens from 42nd Street Photo and can only say my experience was nothing but great. Their web site is very easy and quick to use. After the order was placed, it was followed up with a phone call, verifying and confirming the order. There was no pressure to purchase anything else. Great pleasant people to work with. My future purchases will be from 42 Street. Ed
